meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the different nonproteins in the cell.
meanings.sent2: It is important to understand the role of nonproteins in biological processes.
meanings.sent3: The nonproteins in the solution decided to have a party without the proteins.
meanings.sent4: The nonproteins danced around the proteins, creating a unique chemical reaction.
meanings.sent5: In the world of cells, nonproteins play a crucial supporting role.

meanings.definition: Not relating to or composed of proteins.
meanings.sent1: The nonproteins molecules were carefully analyzed by the researchers.
meanings.sent2: A diet high in nonproteins can still be nutritious.
meanings.sent3: The nonproteins ingredients in the recipe added a surprising twist to the dish.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a dish seasoned with nonproteins, adding a unique flavor to the project.
meanings.sent5: The artist's palette included a variety of colors, just like the nonproteins in the cell.
